text: Surprise! AJ Brown, who appeared in the fourth episode of the Queer Eye reboot, and his fiancé Andrey are married. During Netflix ’ s FYSee event on Thursday, May 31, Brown shared the news with the audience, which was then shared on Twitter. “ The Fab 5 reunited with AJ + Andre, who revealed they ’ re now MARRIED! ” the official account for Netflix ’ s Queer Eye tweeted on Friday, June 1, posting a photo of the show ’ s experts Bobby Berk, Karamo Brown, Tan France, Antoni Porowski and Jonathan Van Ness along with AJ and Drey.
